name: Whiteboards and Stickies (Variants Remix)
description:
Now with variants!


I upgraded this kit to use styles and variant components. It now includes a powerful new Team Sticky Note that allows voting and comments without losing any text.


What's New?


  • Everything converted to variant components
  • Sticky Notes vs. Team Sticky Notes
  • Sticky Notes are reusable stand-alone sticky notes in 3 sizes
  • Team Sticky Notes allow players to vote and make comments on notes
  • New Player Kit: makes it easy for everyone to customize stickies with their name & avatar before an team exercise
  • Text & colors styles


My thanks to @jordanhsu for creating the original project :)
